full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

That's fantastic, thank you.

Best regards,

Matt

Hi Matt,

Hope you are well. We have now updated the images on the pages as sent through. Let me know if there are any more that pop up.
@manuel Great thanks!! I’ll let the client know now.

Hi @heath  everything is updated... if there's something missed please let me know.

ManueL M

Hi Matt, 

Sure, we will work through the below and I will get an update over to you ASAP.

@manuel can you please action this ticket? 

  1. I have created a user account for you on the site, you should have received the email
  2. Next step, here is the instructions for the task: https://www.useloom.com/share/78b5501396104641aad6f45a8969fc5a
  3. Before you start, please setup dropbox to access the photos; here is the instructions: https://www.useloom.com/share/d1e5451c1a224a1f904852ce80cc5ccd and here is the location of the photos: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ltz5l9dleiys2k8/AACtnQi100QdESN7yg5SpjZqa?dl=0  
Thanks and let me know if you have any problems? 

Cheers!!

Hi Heath,

That's great, many thanks. I'm having a member of the team check through each and every article so we'll let you know if we find any more issues like this.

Best regards,

Matt

Hi Matt, 

Confirming we have fixed up the article detailed below. Please let me know if you guys see any other missing images.

Hi Guys,

We're still receiving reports of missing image content for the bretcontreras.com blog. For example, https://bretcontreras.com/10-steps-to-the-perfect-hip-thrust/

Is there anything that can be done to fix this generally, or will we need to specifically check each and every article?

Best regards,

Matt
